Hair clip with built-in phone holder: A hair clip with a built-in phone holder allows you to up your hair and keep your phone close by. Simply up your hair with the clip and your phone into the holder.
Hair clip with LED lights: A hair clip with LED lights is perfect for those who love to dance in the dark. Simply clip the hair clip on and let the lights light up your dance floor.
Hair clip with a built-in fan: A hair clip with a built-in fan is perfect for those hot summer days. Simply clip the hair clip on and let the fan keep you cool while you dance.
Hair clip with a built-in speaker: A hair clip with a built-in speaker is perfect for those who love to dance to music. Simply clip the hair clip on and let the speaker blast your favorite tunes.

Hair clip with a built-in GPS tracker: A hair clip with a built-in GPS tracker is perfect for those who love to dance on the go. Simply clip the hair clip on and let the GPS tracker keep track of your location while you dance.
